title: Strange New Worlds 2 - Dark Sci Fi Music Pack
description: This pack contains 12 sci fi music themes, along with their alternative versions and loops (41 audio files in total). Created to accompany projects that require ethereal, ambient, futuristic, emotional and dark feel to them.
longDescription:
'Strange New Worlds 2' is all about that dark and epic space adventure sound! We included 12 different themes, along with a bunch of loops and alternative edits ( 41 HQ audio files in total). This pack offers the flexibility needed to make your next sci-fi game soundtrack sound powerful and professional. We could definitely imagine it being used during the gameplay or in the main menu of an adventure, arcade, RPG, or any kind of futuristic-themed game! Of course, this pack is suitable for wide variety of different uses, not necessarily tied to game development projects.


Preview available on our official SoundCloud channel here:

https://soundcloud.com/cyberwave-orchestra/sets/strange-new-worlds-2-dark-sci-fi-music-pack

Supported Development Platforms: All


Thank You!
